price: Dan Musa berkata, "Jika kamu dan orang-orang yang ada di muka bumi semuanya mengingkari (nikmat Allah) maka sesungguhnya Allah Maha Kaya 782 lagi Maha Terpuji".
arabic: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِن تَكۡفُرُوٓاْ أَنتُمۡ وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَنِيٌّ حَمِيدٌ
footnotes: 782.  Maksudnya, Allah Subḥānahu wa Ta‘ālā  tidak memerlukan syukur hamba-hamba-Nya.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqāla mūsā in takfurū antum waman fī al-arḍi jamīʿan fa-inna al-laha laghaniyyun ḥamīdun
